title: 150x1112, 03.10.2016
style:
<style type="text/css" media="all">
html, body{
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
}
.reset
{
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    border: 0;
    outline: 0; 
    display: block;
    background: transparent;
    vertical-align: baseline;
    text-decoration: none;
    text-rendering: auto;
    -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
    font-size: 100%;
    -ms-text-size-adjust: 100%;
    -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%;
    font-family: arial, sans serif;
    color: black;
    line-height: normal;
    overflow: hidden;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}
ul {
    list-style: none;
    list-style-image: none;
}
img {
    -ms-interpolation-mode: nearest-neighbor;
    image-rendering: -webkit-optimize-contrast;
}
#mainContainer {
	position: relative;
	width: 150px;
    height: 1112px;
    border: 0px solid #808080;
    background-color: transparent;
    -webkit-border-top-left-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-top-right-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-topleft: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-topright: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-bottomright: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-bottomleft: 5px;
    border-top-left-radius: 5px;
    border-top-right-radius: 5px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
    border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}

#mainHeader {
	position: relative;
	top: 0px;
	left: 0px;
	width: 0px;
    height: 0px;
}

#mainFooter {
	position: relative;
	top: 0px;
	left: 0px;
	width: 0px;
    height: 0px;
}

.advBlock {
	width: 148px;
	height: 218px;
	border: 1px solid #bdbdbd;
        background-color: #ffffff;
	float: left;
	position: relative;
	top: 0px;
	left: 0px;
    margin-top: 0px;
    margin-right: 0px;
    margin-bottom: 3px;
    margin-left: 0px;
    -webkit-border-top-left-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-top-right-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-topleft: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-topright: 5px;

    border-top-right-radius: 5px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;

}

.advHeader, .advHeader:hover, .advHeader:visited, .advHeader:active, .advHeader:link {
	position: absolute;
	top: 126px;
	left: 0px;
	width: 146px;
	height: 32px;
	border: 0px solid #666666;
    cursor:pointer;
	text-align: center;
	color: #0063C2;
    -webkit-border-top-left-radius: 0px;
    -webkit-border-top-right-radius: 0px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: 0px;

	font-size: 14px;
	font-weight: bold;
    font-family: "Lucida Console", Monaco, monospace;;

.advImageConS {

	height: 125px;

	border: 1px solid #ffffff;
    -webkit-border-top-left-radius: 5px;

.advImageS {

.advRecImageS {

.advImageConS ul, .advRecImageConS ul, .advRetImageConS ul {
    position: relative;
    display: -moz-inline-stack;
    display: inline-block;
    zoom: 1;
    *display: inline;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}

.advImageConS ul li, .advRecImageConS ul li, .advRetImageConS ul li {
    float: left;
    display: -moz-inline-stack;
    display: inline-block;
    zoom: 1;
    *display: inline;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}
div.control_prev, div.control_next {
  position: absolute;
  top: 35%;
  z-index: 2000;
  display: block;
  padding: 15% 0%;
  width: auto;
  height: auto;
  background: #2a2a2a;
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 9px;
  opacity: 0.5;
  border: 1px solid #fff;
  cursor: pointer;
  behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}

div.control_prev:hover, div.control_next:hover {
  opacity: 1;
  padding: 15% 15%;
  -webkit-transition: all 0.2s ease;
  behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}

div.control_prev {
  border-radius: 0 5px 5px 0;
  behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}

div.control_next {
  right: 0;
  border-radius: 5px 0 0 5px;
  behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}
.advButton, .advButton:link, .advButton:hover, .advButton:visited, .advButton:active {
	position: relative;
	top: 200px;
	left: 27px;
	width: 95px;
	height: 15px;
	border: 1px solid #9f9feb;
    cursor:pointer;
	text-align: center;
    background-color: #5959d9;
    background:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0.05, #5959d9), color-stop(1, #5959d9));
    background:-moz-linear-gradient(top, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    background:-o-linear-gradient(top, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    background:-ms-linear-gradient(top, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    background:linear-gradient(to bottom, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#5959d9', endColorstr='#5959d9',GradientType=0);
    -webkit-border-top-left-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-top-right-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
    -webkit-border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-topleft: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-topright: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-bottomright: 5px;
    -moz-border-radius-bottomleft: 5px;
    border-top-left-radius: 5px;
    border-top-right-radius: 5px;
    border-bottom-right-radius: 5px;
    border-bottom-left-radius: 5px;
	color: #ffffff;
	font-size: 12px;
	font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;;
	font-weight: bold;
    line-height: 1.2;
    letter-spacing: 0px;
    text-decoration:none;
    z-index: expression(runtimeStyle.zIndex = 1, insertAdjacentHTML('beforeEnd', 'ПОДРОБНЕЕ'));
    border-radius: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}

.advButton:hover {
    background:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0.05, #5959d9), color-stop(1, #5959d9));
    background:-moz-linear-gradient(top, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    background:-webkit-linear-gradient(top, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    background:-o-linear-gradient(top, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    background:-ms-linear-gradient(top, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    background:linear-gradient(to bottom, #5959d9 5%, #5959d9 100%);
    filter:progid:DXImageTransform.Microsoft.gradient(startColorstr='#5959d9', endColorstr='#5959d9',GradientType=0);
    background-color:#5959d9;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}

.advButton span {
    display: none;
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}
.advButton:after {
    content: 'ПОДРОБНЕЕ';
    behavior: url(PIE.htc);
}

.advRetButton, .advRetButton:link, .advRetButton:hover, .advRetButton:visited, .advRetButton:active {
	position: relative;
	top: 200px;
